answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Anne – I didn’t find marketing plans that included both citizen engagement and performance measurers.  I’ve included a couple to documents that I hope are helpful:
Nonprofit Marketing with a Purpose: Developing a Strategic Marketing Plan to Engage New Audiences
http://www.austincc.edu/npo/library/documents/Nonprofit%20Marketing%20with%20a%20Purpose.pdf
La Quinta, CA – marketing plan
http://www.la-quinta.org/Index.aspx?page=499
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450
Pmuse@transformgov.org

author: Anne Lewis
text: I am looking for Marketing Plan documents that local governments have implemented which include a component of citizen engagment and measuring its effectiveness.
title: Marketing Plan
